item.description:
Join us for an intro to climbing technique workshop by Nate.

We'll talk about bouldering, basic hand and footwork, body position, balance and how to climb more efficiently.

This 30 min clinic is ideal for folks that have been climbing for a little while and want to begin to improve their technique, climb more efficiently and progress to the next level. Best part is the clinic is totally free and just for fun. Great for newbies and more experienced climbers...there's something for everyone.

Standard membership, day pass and meetup rates to City Climb apply.

After the clinic we'll play a few rounds of Add On and run a drill or two practicing what you learned.

All experience levels welcome but some indoor climbing experience is recommended. Comment your questions below

Hope you can make it!

Nate
item.how_to_find_us: Let the front desk know you're there for the technique clinic
item.name: Technique Clinic: Intro to Bouldering (Free)
